definition.name: posener/goaction
definition.description: Creates action files for Go code

inputs.name: path
inputs.description: Path to main Go main package.

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: Override action name, the default name is the package name.

inputs.name: desc
inputs.description: Override action description, the default description is the package synopsis.

inputs.name: image
inputs.description: Override Docker image to run the action with (See https://hub.docker.com/_/golang?tab=tags).

inputs.name: install
inputs.description: Comma separated list of requirements to 'apk add'.

inputs.name: icon
inputs.description: Set branding icon. (See options at https://feathericons.com).

inputs.name: color
inputs.description: Set branding color. (white, yellow, blue, green, orange, red, purple or gray-dark).

inputs.name: GITHUB_TOKEN
inputs.description: Github token for PR comments. Optional.

evidence.reasoning: This action is focused on creating action files for Go code, which primarily involves documentation and packaging aspects. It also contributes to code quality by ensuring proper structure and naming conventions.
